mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(post_id, commenter_id, comment_content, comment_time, comment_note, comment_flag) VALUES(#{post_id}, #{commenter_id}, #{comment_content}, #{comment_time}, #{comment_note}, #{comment_flag})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.commenter_id, c.comment_content, u.username, DATE_FORMAT(c.comment_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') comment_time, c.comment_note FROM comment c INNER JOIN user u ON c.commenter_id = u.id WHERE c.post_id = #{post_id} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_note = comment_note + 1 WHERE comment_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.commenter_id, c.comment_content, u.username, DATE_FORMAT(c.comment_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') comment_time, c.comment_note FROM comment c INNER JOIN user u ON c.commenter_id = u.id LEFT JOIN job_post j ON c.post_id = j.post_id WHERE j.writer_id = #{writer_id} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
SELECT count(c.commenter_id) comnum FROM comment c INNER JOIN user u ON c.commenter_id = u.id LEFT JOIN job_post j ON c.post_id = j.post_id WHERE j.writer_id = #{writer_id} and c.comment_flag=1
